backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing supporter requests, supporter approvals, revocations, and user profile storage with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for many frontend source files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.

frontend/src/components/community/PollCa: Shows an individual poll with voting UI, results, and supporter badge logic.
frontend/src/components/community/PollsS: Lists existing polls and provides a form for authenticated users to create new polls.

frontend/src/components/community/PostCo: Loads and displays comments with error handling, supports adding new comments, and toggles comment visibility.
frontend/src/components/community/PostIm: Converts image bytes to a blob URL and renders an attached post image.
frontend/src/components/community/PostLi: Displays like count and toggles like/unlike actions with backend error handling.
frontend/src/components/community/PostVi: Renders a video attachment using a direct streaming URL from an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/community/VideoE: Shows a responsive 16:9 iframe embed for approved video providers.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Fullscreen media lightbox with navigation, keyboard controls, favorites toggle, and storybook support.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryU: Dialog for uploading gallery media with validation, progress tracking, and submission to backend.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with header, navigation, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/LoadingState.tsx: Renders a centered loading spinner with an optional message.
frontend/src/components/Nav.tsx: Implements desktop and mobile navigation menus with active‑link highlighting.
frontend/src/components/profiles/AvatarU: Provides an avatar upload UI with image validation, previews, and blob conversion for profile avatars.
frontend/src/components/profiles/EditPro: Renders a full profile editing panel allowing users to modify display info, avatar, links, plushie images, and visibility settings.
frontend/src/components/profiles/Plushie: Handles multi-image upload, preview management, validation, and removal for plushie gallery images.
frontend/src/components/profiles/Profile: Displays a responsive grid of profile plushie images using direct URLs from stored blobs.

frontend/src/components/supporter/Suppor: Renders a decorative supporter badge with a heart icon and gradient background.
frontend/src/content/articles.ts: Defines the Article interface and exports static article data for the site's content system.
frontend/src/content/events.ts: Placeholder content file for events with no data defined.
frontend/src/content/teddyStorybook.ts: Exports metadata and story content for a Teddy-themed storybook entry.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGalleryFavorites.t: Manages a localStorage-backed favorite IDs set with helpers for checking and toggling favorites.
frontend/src/hooks/useGalleryMediaQuerie: React-query hooks for listing and adding gallery media items using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileQueries.ts: React-query hooks for fetching and updating user profiles, including directory and caller-specific profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: General backend query/mutation hooks for posts, moderation, and admin checks using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaticAssetAvailab: Hook that checks whether a static asset URL is reachable via a HEAD/GET strategy.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupporterQueries.t: Hooks for querying supporters, supporter requests, and submitting/approving supporter actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light-themed color variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static about page presenting mission, values, offerings, and community guidelines using card components.
frontend/src/pages/AdultPacifierBrandsPa: Displays a grid of adult pacifier brands with descriptions and specialties, plus an informational section.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Renders a full article based on slug, including metadata, content, and a not-found state.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Lists all articles in card format with category, read time, summary, and links to details.
frontend/src/pages/ColoringPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityBoardPage.ts: Implements the community board with post creation, media uploads, moderation, and post interactions.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form and email copy tool for users to reach the site administrators.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Allows users to view and create events, handling validation, backend errors, and event formatting.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Implements a searchable, filterable gallery with favorites, uploads, and a lightbox viewer with navigation and authentication prompts.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the landing page with a hero section, calls to action, and featured content sections using responsive design.
frontend/src/pages/PlushieBrandsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of curated plushie brands with descriptions and specialties, plus an informational section about the list.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows an individual user profile with follow/like actions, edit mode, and image/link sections, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilesDirectoryPage: Lists public user profiles in a grid with avatars and bios, including loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: React page for submitting, viewing, approving, and revoking supporter requests with admin controls and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/actorError.ts: Utility for normalizing backend errors into readable messages with special handling for authorization, moderation, and canister issues.
frontend/src/utils/galleryMedia.ts: Defines gallery item types and utilities for converting backend items, merging static and uploaded media, and filtering by search.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachment.ts: Helpers for validating, reading, and formatting image files for uploads with size/type checks.
frontend/src/utils/linkifyText.ts: Parses text into link, video, and plain-text tokens by detecting URLs and video embeds.
frontend/src/utils/profileImages.ts: Utilities for converting files to blobs, creating preview URLs, and retrieving blob direct URLs for profile images.
frontend/src/utils/staticAssetCheck.ts: Checks if a static asset is reachable using HEAD with GET fallback and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/videoAttachment.ts: Provides accepted video MIME types, a 100MB size limit, helpers to format file sizes, and a validator for uploaded video files.
frontend/src/utils/videoEmbeds.ts: Detects YouTube and Vimeo URLs and returns normalized embed descriptors with provider, embed URL, and video ID.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, required profile-system fixes, and a planned teddy-themed storybook gallery item.
